attributes.title: The Best App Ever!!
attributes.review:
This is the best app ever! Just like Trump! It’s just as good as TikTok! I’m using this app instead of TikTok to prepare myself for when TikTok is banned! Here are a few reasons why this app is just like TikTok!✨👻
 
First, I downloaded TikTok as a joke. Just like the Official Trump 2020 app! But then... I got addicted! 😱It was just too entertaining! I couldn’t put it down for HOURS! So if you’re in quarantine and you’re looking for something to do when you’re bored, I definitely recommend this app. 

Second, this app has like, totally LIT🔥 and trendy🌈 content! I mean, I gotta say, the filters that Mr. Trump used for his face to make his face an orange-ish color is so HOT! 🥵 I decided to name that filter: 𝑃𝑒𝑎𝑐ℎ𝑦 𝑂𝑟𝑎𝑛𝑔𝑒 𝑆ℎ𝑖𝑚𝑚𝑒𝑟 𝑆𝑢𝑛𝑠𝑒𝑡 ☀️ 🍑 🍊 ✨.

Third, this app is SOOO entertaining! It has everything I’m looking for in an entertainment app! 😹The sarcasm that the editors imply when talking up Mr. Trump makes me laugh EVERYTIME!🧚🏻‍♂️ I downloaded TikTok not for the cringey dances, not for the makeup tutorials, but for the comedy and funny videos. So this app is my new favorite! ❤️

Fourth, the benefits of downloading this doesn’t just stop there! The app REVIEWS are also incredibly entertaining, maybe even more so than the actual app itself! No matter what people rate this app, from the 5 star ratings to the 1 star ratings, they all are either correct or hilarious. The perfect mix of intelligence and comedy, exactly what I like! 
The 1 star ratings seem to point out the facts and inspire me, and the 5 star ratings are almost as funny as that meme with the kid that dropped a bag of chips and said, “ Hurricane Katrina?? More like Hurricane TORTILLAaAaAaaAaAaAaaaAaAAa!!!!!!!” 

In conclusion, I definitely recommend this app as an alternative for TikTok, and I hope this review was helpful! 👌🏽🤟🏽☺️😉”oh wait was was that you said, Jeff? This app is supposed to be based on facts and is NOT for entertainment and comedy? Oh. Oh then um, forget everything I just said.” 😦😭😓👁👄👁.
